llmSegmentedChunks.chunkText: Service cost (fixed or time-based) ● Travel cost (if mobile) – based on estimated travel time The bot will display a quote breakdown. Is the quote final? Yes. Once you confirm, it is the total price.

Location & Hours ● Address: 9 Dryburgh Street, West Melbourne VIC 3003, Apartment 111 ● Landmark: Across from North Melbourne Station ● Business Hours: ○ Monday to Friday: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM ○ Weekends: by request only ○ Special early/late hours available: as early as 7:00 AM, or as late as 9:00 PM

Account & Customer Info Do I need an account? Yes, a basic account is created automatically using: ● Your WhatsApp number ● Your first name What if I’m a returning customer? The system will recognize your WhatsApp and greet you by name. No need to re-enter details.
